```{r load_common_packages, echo=FALSE, cache=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
library(visibly)
library(htmltools)
library(forcats)
library(lme4)
library(broom)
library(broom.mixed)
library(mixedup)
library(plotly)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(patchwork)

kable_df = function(data, digits=3, ...) {
  kableExtra::kable(
    data,
    digits = digits,
    format = 'html',
    booktabs = T,
    # longtable = F,
    linesep = "", 
    ...,
  ) %>% 
    kableExtra::kable_styling(full_width = F)
}

perc = function(x, digits = 1) paste0(tidyext::rnd(x*100, digits = digits), '%')
```
